name: Kity
description:
Kity wants to touch the flag, but the flag has other plans.. The end of the level is right in front of you, but it is up to you to make it co-operate.

Made in 72 hours using the Godot engine,  submission for Winter Jam 2023 for the theme "the end is near".

Controls:

  • Arrow keys to move
  • SPACE to undo 
  • R to restart level

  • Enter/mouse click to progress dialogue
Solutions:
